name: Summary Page
author: Guo Quan

sections.description:
List and/or include sub-pages with meta option.

After installing and activating the plugin, add a custom field (meta) ‘is_summary’ to a page and set to 1 to enable showing all its child pages (non-cascaded) after the page itself.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload summary-page.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Edit a page (with some child pages), add a custom field ‘is_summary’ and set to 1 to enable displaying all its child pages right after it.

short_description: List and/or include sub-pages (child pages) with meta option.
description:
List and/or include sub-pages with meta option.

After installing and activating the plugin, add a custom field (meta) ‘is_summary’ to a page and set to 1 to enable showing all its child pages (non-cascaded) after the page itself.
